document.full_text: a wisconsin judge issued a revised order on tuesday blocking implementation of a controversial state law curbing collective bargaining by public unions while she hears a legal challenge to the proposed law.
document.title: judge blocks wisconsin's anti-union law
lines_and_colors: a wisconsin judge issued a revised order on tuesday blocking implementation of a controversial state law curbing collective bargaining by public unions while she hears a legal challenge to the proposed law.
